thread.title: Very nice hotel
thread.title_full: Very nice hotel - Review of The Westbridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: EugenMartel
title: Very nice hotel
text: The hotel and our stay were very nice. The hotel is a little bit outsite but a tube station is near it so it was not really a problem. the service was quite good but it could be better with following point: it was possible to open a window but we have to call to close it every time to the reception. we arrived at the morning before our check in time, from my understanding the room was already availible but we had to wait until the normal check in time... was not really a problem but it could be the dot over an i.
